posts.post_content:
Down to the final NOW 2 PSA 2s for the all PSA 2 set (520).  One Southern Leaguer and one common.  List is below.  If you have any of these and are willing to move them, let me know via PM.

Removed my email address as I just had a scammer try to sell me a Lafitte.

Thanks!

Troy


Have both in slightly higher grades available to downgrade should someone have either of these in a 2.

only PSA2s are needed.  No other TPGs, No 2.5s and No qualifiers.

thanks!

Very Cool Set, congrats on the progress and best of luck with completion. I’ve enjoyed following your progress

Cheers

Colton

[quote name="nineunder71" post=2335635]Very Cool Set, congrats on the progress and best of luck with completion. I’ve enjoyed following your progress

Cheers

Colton[/QUOTE]

Thanks!
Updated list now posted.  Please let me know if you can assist!!

Inching closer to 500! 26 more to go (Maybe 27 if the USPS can't get it together!!).  

Let me know if you have any that can help!

Thanks!!

Troy Rambo

Gaining on it!  Down to 24!  Almost in the 500 club again!

Feel free to reach out if you can assist.  

Thanks!

[quote name="trambo" post=2339807]Gaining on it!  Down to 24!  Almost in the 500 club again!

Feel free to reach out if you can assist.  

Thanks![/QUOTE]

You just picked up the Doyle from me on ebay.
It's being dropped off at the post office tonight!
Thanks!

[quote name="babraham" post=2339944]You just picked up the Doyle from me on ebay.
It's being dropped off at the post office tonight!
Thanks![/QUOTE]

Thanks!  If you happen to have any more from the list above, let me know!
Now down to 19!  Starting to get really close!!
thanks for all the help!  I'm down to 13!  Here's the list:

Molesworth secured.  Down to 11!  If you can assist w/a PSA 2 of any of these 11, please PM me.  

Thanks!!
Sorry for the next day bump but I'm down to 6 now.  Help if you can to get me to 520 on this one!  Thanks!

another bump.  Still need 6!  Help if you can!

thanks!!

Down to 4!  Help if you can!  3 commons of varying difficulty and 1 SLer.

Thanks!

now down to 2!

Hub Perdue
Germany Schaefer (Washington)

I have both in higher grades (Perdue 3 and Schaefer in a 3.5) so if anyone has a 2 they'd be willing to trade w/a little cash for the upgrade, I'm all ears!  

So....freaking.....close.... haha

Still down to 2!  Help a brother out...haha

Hub Perdue
Germany Schaefer (Washington)

I have both in higher grades (Perdue 3 and Schaefer in a 3.5) so if anyone has a 2 they'd be willing to trade w/a little cash for the upgrade, I'm all ears!

Thanks for putting up w/these posts!  Just secured 519 a few days ago and 520 tonight.  Barring the USPS or FedEx losing them, I should be done w/the 2 set!  

Doubtful I keep it for long as it's my 2nd set so if anyone is interested in discussing a 520, let me know.  Not planning on breaking it so please don't ask!

Thanks for all of your help A fun project that took just over 2 years to get through!  Also, way more difficult than I imagined it would be and definitely harder than just building it in any grade!!  

TRambo
